name: Image Sidecar Plugin
_comment_version: You dont need to update this field
description: Detects when an image or pdf is added and automatically creates a sidecar file in the same directory. Scans for pdf, jpg, png, gif, webp, tiff, bmp formats

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

scripts.copy: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp manifest.json dist/ && (shx test -f styles.css && shx cp styles.css dist/ || shx echo no-styles)
scripts.deploy: shx rm -rf "$PLUGIN_DIR" && shx mkdir -p "$PLUGIN_DIR" && shx cp -r dist/* "$PLUGIN_DIR"
